00025 void GetSectorFacilitiesFlags( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, STR16 sFacilitiesString )
00026 {
00027       // will build a string stating current facilities present in sector
00028 
00029       if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].uiFacilitiesFlags == 0 )
00030       {
00031             // none
00032         swprintf( sFacilitiesString, L"%s", sFacilitiesStrings[ 0 ] );
00033             return;
00034       }
00035 
00036 
00037       // hospital
00038       if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].uiFacilitiesFlags & SFCF_HOSPITAL )
00039       {
00040             swprintf( sFacilitiesString, L"%s", sFacilitiesStrings[ 1 ] );
00041       }
00042 
00043       // industry
00044       if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].uiFacilitiesFlags & SFCF_INDUSTRY )
00045       {
00046             if( wcslen( sFacilitiesString ) == 0 )
00047             {
00048               swprintf( sFacilitiesString, L"%s", sFacilitiesStrings[ 2 ] );
00049             }
00050             else
00051             {
00052                   wcscat( sFacilitiesString, L",");
00053                   wcscat( sFacilitiesString, sFacilitiesStrings[ 2 ]);
00054             }
00055       }
00056 
00057       // prison
00058       if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].uiFacilitiesFlags & SFCF_PRISON )
00059       {
00060             if( wcslen( sFacilitiesString ) == 0 )
00061             {
00062               swprintf( sFacilitiesString, L"%s", sFacilitiesStrings[ 3 ] );
00063             }
00064             else
00065             {
00066                   wcscat( sFacilitiesString, L",");
00067                   wcscat( sFacilitiesString, sFacilitiesStrings[ 3 ]);
00068             }
00069       }
00070 
00071       // airport
00072       if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].uiFacilitiesFlags & SFCF_AIRPORT )
00073       {
00074             if( wcslen( sFacilitiesString ) == 0 )
00075             {
00076               swprintf( sFacilitiesString, L"%s", sFacilitiesStrings[ 5 ] );
00077             }
00078             else
00079             {
00080                   wcscat( sFacilitiesString, L",");
00081                   wcscat( sFacilitiesString, sFacilitiesStrings[ 5 ]);
00082             }
00083       }
00084 
00085       // gun range
00086       if( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].uiFacilitiesFlags & SFCF_GUN_RANGE )
00087       {
00088             if( wcslen( sFacilitiesString ) == 0 )
00089             {
00090               swprintf( sFacilitiesString, L"%s", sFacilitiesStrings[ 6 ] );
00091             }
00092             else
00093             {
00094                   wcscat( sFacilitiesString, L",");
00095                   wcscat( sFacilitiesString, sFacilitiesStrings[ 6 ]);
00096             }
00097       }
00098       
00099       sFacilitiesString[ wcslen( sFacilitiesString ) ] = 0;
00100 
00101       return;
00102 }

00105 // ALL changes of control to player must be funneled through here!
00106 BOOLEAN SetThisSectorAsPlayerControlled( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ, BOOLEAN fContested )
00107 {
00108       // NOTE: MapSector must be 16-bit, cause MAX_WORLD_X is actually 18, so the sector numbers exceed 256 although we use only 16x16
00109       UINT16 usMapSector = 0;
00110       BOOLEAN fWasEnemyControlled = FALSE;
00111       INT8 bTownId = 0;
00112       UINT8 ubSectorID;
00113 
00114 
00115       if( AreInMeanwhile( ) )
00116       {
00117             return FALSE;
00118       }
00119 
00120       if( bMapZ == 0 )
00121       {
00122             usMapSector = sMapX + ( sMapY * MAP_WORLD_X );
00123 
00124 /*
00125             // if enemies formerly controlled this sector
00126             if (StrategicMap[ usMapSector ].fEnemyControlled)
00127             {
00128                   // remember that the enemies have lost it
00129                   StrategicMap[ usMapSector ].fLostControlAtSomeTime = TRUE;
00130             }
00131 */
00132             if( NumHostilesInSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ ) )
00133             { //too premature:  enemies still in sector.
00134                   return FALSE;
00135             }
00136 
00137             // check if we ever grabbed drassen airport, if so, set fact we can go to BR's
00138             if( ( sMapX == BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_X ) && ( sMapY == BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_Y ) )
00139             {
00140                   LaptopSaveInfo.fBobbyRSiteCanBeAccessed = TRUE;
00141 
00142                   //If the player has been to Bobbyr when it was down, and we havent already sent email, send him an email
00143                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubHaveBeenToBobbyRaysAtLeastOnceWhileUnderConstruction == BOBBYR_BEEN_TO_SITE_ONCE &&  LaptopSaveInfo.ubHaveBeenToBobbyRaysAtLeastOnceWhileUnderConstruction != BOBBYR_ALREADY_SENT_EMAIL )
00144                   {
00145                         AddEmail( BOBBYR_NOW_OPEN, BOBBYR_NOW_OPEN_LENGTH, BOBBY_R, GetWorldTotalMin());
00146                         LaptopSaveInfo.ubHaveBeenToBobbyRaysAtLeastOnceWhileUnderConstruction = BOBBYR_ALREADY_SENT_EMAIL;
00147                   }
00148             }
00149 
00150             fWasEnemyControlled = StrategicMap[ usMapSector ].fEnemyControlled;
00151 
00152             StrategicMap[ usMapSector ].fEnemyControlled = FALSE;
00153             SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].fPlayer[ bMapZ ] = TRUE;
00154 
00155             bTownId = StrategicMap[ usMapSector ].bNameId;
00156 
00157             // check if there's a town in the sector
00158             if ((bTownId >= FIRST_TOWN) && (bTownId < NUM_TOWNS))
00159             {
00160                   // yes, start tracking (& displaying) this town's loyalty if not already doing so
00161                   StartTownLoyaltyIfFirstTime( bTownId );
00162             }
00163 
00164 
00165             // if player took control away from enemy
00166             if( fWasEnemyControlled && fContested )
00167             {
00168                   // and it's a town
00169                   if ((bTownId >= FIRST_TOWN) && (bTownId < NUM_TOWNS))
00170                   {
00171                         // don't do these for takeovers of Omerta sectors at the beginning of the game
00172                         if ((bTownId != OMERTA) || (GetWorldDay() != 1))
00173                         {
00174                               ubSectorID = (UINT8)SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY );
00175                               if( !bMapZ && ubSectorID != SEC_J9 && ubSectorID != SEC_K4 )
00176                               {
00177                                     HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_TOWN_LIBERATED, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00178                                     HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_GAIN_TOWN_SECTOR, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00179 
00180                                     // liberation by definition requires that the place was enemy controlled in the first place
00181                                     CheckIfEntireTownHasBeenLiberated( bTownId, sMapX, sMapY );
00182                               }
00183                         }
00184                   }
00185 
00186                   // if it's a mine that's still worth something
00187                   if ( IsThereAMineInThisSector( sMapX, sMapY ) )
00188                   {
00189                         if ( GetTotalLeftInMine( GetMineIndexForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) ) > 0)
00190                         {
00191                               HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_MINE_LIBERATED, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00192                               HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_GAIN_MINE, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00193                         }
00194                   }
00195 
00196                   // if it's a SAM site sector
00197                   if( IsThisSectorASAMSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ ) )
00198                   {
00199                         if ( 1 /*!GetSectorFlagStatus( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_SECTOR_HAS_BEEN_LIBERATED_ONCE ) */)
00200                         {
00201                               // SAM site liberated for first time, schedule meanwhile                            
00202                               HandleMeanWhileEventPostingForSAMLiberation( GetSAMIdFromSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ ) );
00203                         }
00204 
00205                         HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_SAM_SITE_LIBERATED, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00206                         HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_GAIN_SAM, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00207 
00208                         // if Skyrider has been delivered to chopper, and already mentioned Drassen SAM site, but not used this quote yet
00209                         if ( IsHelicopterPilotAvailable() && ( guiHelicopterSkyriderTalkState >= 1 ) && ( !gfSkyriderSaidCongratsOnTakingSAM ) )
00210                         {
00211                               SkyRiderTalk( SAM_SITE_TAKEN );
00212                               gfSkyriderSaidCongratsOnTakingSAM = TRUE;
00213                         }
00214 
00215                         if ( !SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].fSurfaceWasEverPlayerControlled )
00216                         {
00217                               // grant grace period
00218                               if ( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel >= DIF_LEVEL_HARD )
00219                               {
00220                                     UpdateLastDayOfPlayerActivity( ( UINT16 ) ( GetWorldDay() + 2 ) );
00221                               }
00222                               else
00223                               {
00224                                     UpdateLastDayOfPlayerActivity( ( UINT16 ) ( GetWorldDay() + 1 ) );
00225                               }
00226                         }
00227                   }
00228 
00229                   // if it's a helicopter refueling site sector
00230                   if( IsRefuelSiteInSector( sMapX, sMapY) )
00231                   {
00232                         UpdateRefuelSiteAvailability( );
00233                   }
00234 
00235 //                SetSectorFlag( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_SECTOR_HAS_BEEN_LIBERATED_ONCE );
00236                   if ( bMapZ == 0 && ( ( sMapY == MAP_ROW_M && (sMapX >= 2 && sMapX <= 6) ) || sMapY == MAP_ROW_N && sMapX == 6) )
00237                   {
00238                         HandleOutskirtsOfMedunaMeanwhileScene();
00239                   }
00240             }
00241 
00242             if( fContested )
00243             {
00244                   StrategicHandleQueenLosingControlOfSector( (UINT8)sMapX, (UINT8)sMapY, (UINT8)bMapZ );
00245             }
00246       }
00247       else
00248       {
00249             if( sMapX == 3 && sMapY == 16 && bMapZ == 1 )
00250             { //Basement sector (P3_b1)
00251                   gfUseAlternateQueenPosition = TRUE;
00252             }
00253       }
00254 
00255       // also set fact the player knows they own it
00256       SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].fPlayer[ bMapZ ] = TRUE;
00257 
00258       if ( bMapZ == 0 )
00259       {
00260             SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].fSurfaceWasEverPlayerControlled = TRUE;
00261       }
00262 
00263       //KM : Aug 11, 1999 -- Patch fix:  Relocated this check so it gets called everytime a sector changes hands,
00264       //     even if the sector isn't a SAM site.  There is a bug _somewhere_ that fails to update the airspace,
00265       //     even though the player controls it.  
00266       UpdateAirspaceControl( );
00267 
00268       // redraw map/income if in mapscreen
00269       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE; 
00270       fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00271 
00272       return fWasEnemyControlled;
00273 }

00275 
00276 // ALL changes of control to enemy must be funneled through here!
00277 BOOLEAN SetThisSectorAsEnemyControlled( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ, BOOLEAN fContested )
00278 {
00279       UINT16 usMapSector = 0;
00280       BOOLEAN fWasPlayerControlled = FALSE;
00281       INT8 bTownId = 0;
00282       UINT8 ubTheftChance;
00283       UINT8 ubSectorID;
00284 
00285       //KM : August 6, 1999 Patch fix
00286       //     This check was added because this function gets called when player mercs retreat from an unresolved
00287       //     battle between militia and enemies.  It will get called again AFTER autoresolve is finished.
00288       if( gfAutomaticallyStartAutoResolve )
00289       {
00290             return( FALSE );
00291       }
00292 
00293       if( bMapZ == 0 )
00294       {
00295             usMapSector = sMapX + ( sMapY * MAP_WORLD_X );
00296 
00297             fWasPlayerControlled = !StrategicMap[ usMapSector ].fEnemyControlled;
00298 
00299             StrategicMap[ usMapSector ].fEnemyControlled = TRUE;
00300 
00301             // if player lost control to the enemy
00302             if ( fWasPlayerControlled )
00303             {
00304                   if( PlayerMercsInSector( (UINT8)sMapX, (UINT8)sMapY, (UINT8)bMapZ ) )
00305                   { //too premature:  Player mercs still in sector.
00306                         return FALSE;
00307                   }
00308 
00309                   // check if there's a town in the sector
00310                   bTownId = StrategicMap[ usMapSector ].bNameId;
00311 
00312                   SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].fPlayer[ bMapZ ] = FALSE;
00313 
00314                   // and it's a town
00315                   if ((bTownId >= FIRST_TOWN) && (bTownId < NUM_TOWNS))
00316                   {
00317                         ubSectorID = (UINT8)SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY );
00318                         if( !bMapZ && ubSectorID != SEC_J9 && ubSectorID != SEC_K4 )
00319                         {
00320                               HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_TOWN_LOST, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00321                               HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_LOSE_TOWN_SECTOR, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00322 
00323                               CheckIfEntireTownHasBeenLost( bTownId, sMapX, sMapY );
00324                         }
00325                   }
00326 
00327                   // if the sector has a mine which is still worth something
00328                   if ( IsThereAMineInThisSector( sMapX, sMapY ) )
00329                   {
00330                         // if it isn't empty
00331                         if ( GetTotalLeftInMine( GetMineIndexForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) ) > 0)
00332                         {
00333                               QueenHasRegainedMineSector(GetMineIndexForSector (sMapX, sMapY));
00334                               HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_MINE_LOST, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00335                               HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_LOSE_MINE, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00336                         }
00337                   }
00338 
00339                   // if it's a SAM site sector
00340                   if( IsThisSectorASAMSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ ) )
00341                   {
00342                         HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_SAM_SITE_LOST, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00343                         HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_LOSE_SAM, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00344                   }
00345 
00346                   // if it's a helicopter refueling site sector
00347                   if( IsRefuelSiteInSector( sMapX, sMapY) )
00348                   {
00349                         UpdateRefuelSiteAvailability( );
00350                   }
00351 
00352                   // ARM: this must be AFTER all resulting loyalty effects are resolved, or reduced mine income shown won't be accurate
00353                   NotifyPlayerWhenEnemyTakesControlOfImportantSector( sMapX, sMapY, 0, fContested );
00354             }
00355 
00356             // NOTE: Stealing is intentionally OUTSIDE the fWasPlayerControlled branch.  This function gets called if new
00357             // enemy reinforcements arrive, and they deserve another crack at stealing what the first group missed! :-)
00358 
00359             // stealing should fail anyway 'cause there shouldn't be a temp file for unvisited sectors, but let's check anyway
00360             if ( GetSectorFlagStatus( sMapX, sMapY, ( UINT8 ) bMapZ, SF_ALREADY_VISITED ) == TRUE )
00361             {
00362                   // enemies can steal items left lying about (random chance).  The more there are, the more they take!
00363                   ubTheftChance = 5 * NumEnemiesInAnySector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00364                   // max 90%, some stuff may just simply not get found
00365                   if (ubTheftChance > 90 )
00366                   {
00367                         ubTheftChance = 90;
00368                   }
00369                   RemoveRandomItemsInSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, ubTheftChance );
00370             }
00371 
00372             // don't touch fPlayer flag for a surface sector lost to the enemies!
00373             // just because player has lost the sector doesn't mean he realizes it - that's up to our caller to decide!
00374       }
00375       else
00376       {
00377             // underground sector control is always up to date, because we don't track control down there
00378             SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ].fPlayer[ bMapZ ] = FALSE;
00379       }
00380 
00381       //KM : Aug 11, 1999 -- Patch fix:  Relocated this check so it gets called everytime a sector changes hands,
00382       //     even if the sector isn't a SAM site.  There is a bug _somewhere_ that fails to update the airspace,
00383       //     even though the player controls it.  
00384       UpdateAirspaceControl( );
00385 
00386       // redraw map/income if in mapscreen
00387       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE; 
00388       fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00389 
00390       return fWasPlayerControlled;
00391 }

00394 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00395 void ClearMapControlledFlags( void )
00396 {
00397       INT32 iCounterA = 0, iCounterB = 0;
00398       UINT16 usMapSector = 0;
00399 
00400 
00401       for( iCounterA = 1; iCounterA < MAP_WORLD_X - 1; iCounterA++ )
00402       {
00403             for( iCounterB = 1; iCounterB < MAP_WORLD_Y - 1; iCounterB++ )
00404             {
00405                   usMapSector = iCounterA + ( iCounterB * MAP_WORLD_X );
00406                   StrategicMap[ usMapSector ].fEnemyControlled = FALSE;
00407                   SectorInfo[ SECTOR( iCounterA, iCounterB ) ].fPlayer[ 0 ] = TRUE;
00408             }
00409       }
00410 }
00411 #endif

00430 void MakePlayerPerceptionOfSectorControlCorrect( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )

00441 
00442 void ReplaceSoldierProfileInPlayerGroup( UINT8 ubGroupID, UINT8 ubOldProfile, UINT8 ubNewProfile )
00443 {
00444       GROUP *pGroup;
00445       PLAYERGROUP *curr;
00446 
00447       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
00448 
00449       if ( !pGroup )
00450       {
00451             return;
00452       }
00453 
00454       curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
00455 
00456       while( curr )
00457       {
00458             if( curr->ubProfileID == ubOldProfile )
00459             {
00460                   // replace and return!
00461                   curr->ubProfileID = ubNewProfile;
00462                   return;
00463             }
00464             curr = curr->next;
00465       }
00466       
00467 }
